dct_description_sm: Panel title. Map shows three classes of roads, perennial rivers, reefs, indigenous reserves, national parks and reserves, national and provincial capitals, beaches, airports, and points of interest. Includes index. On recto: locator map of Costa Rica and ancillary map of Isla del Coco. On verso: map of downtown San José and locator map of San José showing primary and secondary roads and national parks. Map of downtown San José on verso includes index to streets and points of interest.
